org.unbunt.ella.engine.environment
Interface Env

All Known Subinterfaces:
SearchableEnv
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractEnv, DynamicEnv, MainEnv, StaticEnv, StaticSearchableEnv, TopEnv
public interface Env

Represents an environment holding bindings of names to their respective values.

Method Summary
 void add(Variable var, Obj value)
          Extends this environment with the given variable and associates the given value with it.
 void extend(Variable var)
          Extends this environment with the given variable.

          Returns the home continuation registered in this environment.
 int getClosureHomeOffset()
          Returns the offset of the home continuation in the continuation stack.

          Returns the current activation context.
 int getMaxAddress()
          Returns the highest address of a variable currently known to this environment.

          Returns the current super context.

          Returns this environment converted into an equivalent scope object.

setContext

void setContext(Obj context)
Installs the given object as the activation context.

Parameters:
context - the object to install as activation context.

Obj getContext()
Returns the current activation context.

Returns:
the current activation context.

setReceiver

void setReceiver(Obj context)
Instals the given object as the super context.

Parameters:
context - the object to install as super context.

getReceiver

Obj getReceiver()
Returns the current super context.

Returns:
the current super context. May return null to indicate no super context was explicitly set so far.

Parameters:

Returns:
the variable's associated value.

get

Obj get(Variable var,
        int addr)
Returns the value associated with the given variable. Uses the given lexical address during lookup of the variable.

Parameters:

addr - the variable's lexical address.
Returns:
the variable's associated value.

setClosureHome

void setClosureHome(int offset,
                    Continuation cont)
Installs the given continuation as the currently active home continuation of the block closure referencing this environment.

Parameters:
offset - the home continuation's offset in the continuation stack.
cont - the home continuation

getClosureHomeOffset

int getClosureHomeOffset()
Returns the offset of the home continuation in the continuation stack.

Returns:
the offset or -1 if there is no home continuation is registered with this environment.

getClosureHomeCont

Continuation getClosureHomeCont()
Returns the home continuation registered in this environment.

Returns:
the home continuation.

toScope

Scope toScope()
Returns this environment converted into an equivalent scope object.

Returns:
the scope.
